gen:link.msg:message: `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `RemunerationUnduePayments` - `IndividualMaximumRemuneration`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_IndividualMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_IndividualMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationUnduePayments` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `RemunerationUnduePayments` - `UnduePayments`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_Remuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_Remuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
